Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
Description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward.
